author: Bethany Allen-Ebrahimian
title: China adopts Russia's disinformation playbook
description: The Chinese Communist Party has spent the past week publicly pushing conspiracy theories intended to cast doubt on the origins of the coronavirus, and thus deflect criticism over China's early mishandling of the epidemic. Why it matters: The strategy is a cle…
